column6:
"SILVER SABLE" ,2006,2

Just when Spidey has things under control with Silver Sable, in flies a winged horror to make his Ultimate debut-the Vulture! And this is a Vulture more deadly than you can imagine, with weapons to make him a match for any super hero. But is it Spidey he wants to take down or is there an even more sinister agenda involved-including the Roxxon Corporation? Guest starring Ultimate Iron Man! Part 5 (of 5).


32 PGS./RATED A ...$2.50
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:J. D. Smith
